language.phrase: Here you can update your gallery configuration.
Number of images displayed in one row
If Yes users will be able to rate images
Yes to enable watermark feature, upload your watermark.png file in /upload/ directory using File Manager
Here you can add new CMS Gallery.
This is the name of the folder where all the images will be stored. Each gallery can have it's own unique directory. Use only Alpha-Numeric characters and no spaces
Here you can manage your Gallery media. Drag and drop upload is available in Firefox, Chrome IE10+ and Safari browser.
You don't have any media assigned under this gallery yet...
Here you can manage your galleries. Note: Deleting gallery will also delete all images under the same gallery.
You don't have any galleries yet...
Here you can sort your gallery images. Drag image, position where you want it, and sorting order will be saved.
Click on image title or description to edit. Changes will be saved instantly.
You can upload up to 5 images at once, maximum 6MB in size each, with following extensions (jpg, jpeg and png)
